explains: adj. 想象的，虚构的；虚数的

sentences.en: Lots of children have imaginary friends.
sentences.cn: 许多孩子都有假想的朋友。

sentences.en: Many children invent an imaginary friend.
sentences.cn: 很多儿童都有一个假想朋友。

sentences.en: The equator is an imaginary line around the middle of the earth.
sentences.cn: 赤道是一条假想的环绕地球腰部的线。
